text: Absalọm nwa Devid nwere otu nwanne nwanyị mara mma, aha ya bụ Tama.13:1 Tama bụ nwa nwanyị Maaka, nwa Talmi, eze Geshua 2Sa 3:3 Amnọn bụ ọkpara Devid, nke Ahinoam nwunye mbụ ya mụtara. Nʼusoro omenaala, ọ bụ Amnọn kwesiri ịnọchi anya eze ma ọ nwụọ. Ma Amnọn, otu nʼime ụmụ ndị ikom Devid, hụrụ nwaagbọghọ a nʼanya.
